channel.title: Events on CoLoMoTo
channel.description: Recent content in Events on CoLoMoTo

item.title: Meeting on Discrete Models and Formal Verification in Biology
item.description: Meeting about using cutting edge techniques from computer science. Murray Edwards College, Cambridge, August 29-31.

item.title: Tutorial at ICSB 2017
item.description: ICSB 2017 will have a hands-on tutorial on logical modeling organized by Tomas Helikar and Julio Saez-Rodriguez.

item.title: Workshop at [BC]2 2017
item.description: Workshop on logical modelling of biological regulatory networks. Basel, Sept. 12th, 2017.

item.title: Tutorial at ICSB 2016
item.description: ICSB 2016 will have a tutorial on logical modelling tools on September 21.

item.title: Workshop and tutorial at ICSB 2015
item.description: ICSB 2015 had a logical modelling Workshop and tutorial organized by Matteo Barberis, C. Chaouiya, and T Helikar. See the material for the tutorial.

item.title: Tutorial at BC2 2015
item.description: [BC]2 2015 has a tutorial on Logical modelling of regulatory networks organized by C. Chaouiya and A. Naldi.

item.title: Workshop at ECCB 2014
item.description: The 2014 edition of the European Conference on Computational Biology has a workshop on logical modelling.

item.title: Third CoLoMoTo meeting (Lausanne, April 2014)
item.description: Extending the reach, Center for Integrative Genomics

item.title: Second CoLoMoTo meeting (Hinxton, March 2012)
item.description: Setting up the consortium on the EBI campus
